alert.note: Alert for Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 11:31PM CDT until August 06 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RILEY...WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE...EASTERN WASHINGTON AND WESTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bremen to 3 miles south of Randolph, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marysville, Blue Rapids, Riley, Hanover, Waterville, Leonardville, Olsburg, Randolph, Barnes, Oketo, Bremen and Tuttle Creek Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
